Title: Old boatman on the Yangtze River
Designer: Xu Xiaojiang (许晓江)Nanjing Troops (南京部队)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The 'old boatman' tells the children (Pioneers) of the days before the Yangzi River Bridge was built, when he had to row.
Theme: The Yangzi River Bridge in Nanjing
